DialogueDictionary.MAIN COMPUTER: Log access granted, SOLAN:
MAIN COMPUTER: Log access granted, SOLANUM. 
USER REQUEST: «Last access granted». Calculating...
DialogueDictionary.MAIN COMPUTER: Last access granted 281,0:
MAIN COMPUTER: Last access granted 281,042 years ago. 
USER = Mallow.
DialogueDictionary.Visualizing progress. Deep space anomaly: Visualizing progress. Deep space anomaly matching all known criteria for the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>]]> has been found.
<![CDATA[<TimeMinutes>]]> MINUTES, <![CDATA[<TimeSeconds>]]> SECONDS AGO: Data received from previous cycles.
DialogueDictionary.ASH TWIN PROJECT: Receiving data cycle s: <![CDATA[<TimeMinutes>]]> MINUTES, <![CDATA[<TimeSeconds>]]> SECONDS AGO: Data received from previous cycles.

MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>]]> 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> memory statue
DialogueDictionary.MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: <![CDATA[<col:
MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>]]> 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> memory statue
DialogueDictionary.WARNING! Removing the core will disable: WARNING! Removing the core will disable the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]>.
SOLANUM: I.. Do I exist? That's me but... How is it possible? I can't stay here anymore, I'm leaving and I took my recorder. Where am I? Is it the state of Timber Hea....
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I.. I don't understand.. wh.. w: SOLANUM: I.. I don't understand.. wh.. what just.. what is this feeling? What is all of this? All answers are in the sky?
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Have you seen this? Our <![CDAT: SOLANUM: Have you seen this? Our <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>sun</color>]]> is dying and you.. are you paired with the one of statues? Someone at <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>]]> is also paired. I wonder who or what that could be?
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Never mind, I forgot that you c: SOLANUM: Never mind, I forgot that you can't respond since I cannot understand your language.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It appears that I am also paire: SOLANUM: It appears that I am also paired now. I ended up right in front of that nearby statue when I thought about this place.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I guess we're both trapped in t: SOLANUM: I guess we're both trapped in the time loop right before the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>sun</color>]]> goes supernova. It's our lucky day, huh? ...or not. Sorry.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I just realized that we're runn: SOLANUM: I just realized that we're running out of time. Most likely I'll be back on the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>]]> after the loop resets according to your memories? That's how it works, right? Will see next loop!
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Can we actually escape? The sup: SOLANUM: Can we actually escape? The supernova will be really huge, but what if we just fly away from it? It should work. The warp core is charged from the last loop's supernova so we can try using it to get out of here before the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>sun</color>]]> explodes again.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: According to your vision, <![CD: SOLANUM: According to your vision, <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]> is inside <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>]]>. There is a possibility that it is still working. My chances of getting there are slim, but I must at least try.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Now I see how this time loop re: SOLANUM: Now I see how this time loop reset is working. I remember everything from previous loop.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: How was Daz saying it? <![CDATA: SOLANUM: How was Daz saying it? «Sending memories back in time and going back in time physically are two different actions»]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Anyway, now I know how it works: SOLANUM: Anyway, now I know how it works. So, let's continue? I'll open the core once again, but next loop it's your turn.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: This place is our school. It te: SOLANUM: This place is our school. It teaches us about the universe, stars, singularities, gravity, and everything related to it. It wasn't so unstable before, and I'm not sure, but I remember the black hole being smaller.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: As a student, it was easy for m: SOLANUM: As a student, it was easy for me to imagine the universe collapsing because I never imagined it could happen in my lifetime...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: These buildings are not stable,: SOLANUM: These buildings are not stable, so I took this gravity crystal just in case. This is the second one by the way. The first one freaked out somehow and inverted gravity, so I had to break it.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I'm not sure if this happened b: SOLANUM: I'm not sure if this happened because of me or because of the black hole effect, but I cannot be 100% certain this one will be stable either.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Guess what? Everything works de: SOLANUM: Guess what? Everything works despite the damage! That's incredible! I am a Nomai, so I think can handle its system.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: You see this whiteboard? <![CDA: SOLANUM: You see this whiteboard? <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]> is still getting incoming signals from other Nomai even here, inside <![CDATA[<color=orange>Dark Bramble</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Wait, is it.. Hm.. Yes! YES! I: SOLANUM: Wait, is it.. Hm.. Yes! YES! I don't know how but I actually managed to trace the location of Canna's messages all the way back to the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Gloaming Galaxy</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Canna said that there is a safe: SOLANUM: Canna said that there is a safe place called <![CDATA[<color=orange>Blackrock</color>]]>. That's exactly what we need! The coordinates should be shown on the hologram panel under <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]> bridge.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Did you bring the <![CDATA[<col: SOLANUM: Did you bring the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Warp Core</color>]]>? This one is broken. Unfortunately, we have little time. There's no way back and the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> will not send back our memories this time.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: So many things happened here in: SOLANUM: So many things happened here in our Solar System, mine and yours. Our lives may have been different, but our destiny is the same.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I'm sorry about your friends an: SOLANUM: I'm sorry about your friends and your kind. We can't help them, sadly. I knew this day would come. Conoy even told me once that it wouldn't happen in our lifetimes... well, here we are in the right place at the right time. We need to help ourselves for now, this is just the Universe's laws, we can't stop this...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I am ready my friend, but the d: SOLANUM: I am ready my friend, but the decision is yours.
SOLANUM: Ah, this is my home... it was. Even my toys are still here... See? The <![CDATA[<color=orange>Eye</color>]]> has always fascinated me since I was a child.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Obviously, it has no reason to: SOLANUM: Obviously, it has no reason to wait for us, but my dad and the others were blinded by the desire for knowledge.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: The whole city, elders and kids: SOLANUM: The whole city, elders and kids, all turned to ashes... This is very hard to handle. It doesn't make it feel any better knowing that I'm the last Nomai alive.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: At least now I can say goodbye: SOLANUM: At least now I can say goodbye to them... and... please stand back. There is more that needs to be turned into ash...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: We finally found the <![CDATA[<: SOLANUM: We finally found the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye</color>]]>. My clan would be happy for that, but not me.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I am thankful for your vision,: SOLANUM: I am thankful for your vision, now I know exactly why it was not easy to find. Those strangers from another star system, they knew everything about the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>]]>, I wish we could too.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Who knows how many other intell: SOLANUM: Who knows how many other intelligent life forms it has lured? I don't think I want to know anything more about it. Even in my childhood I knew that it was not waiting for us or anyone else.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: .. Is that Memory Statue active: SOLANUM: .. Is that Memory Statue active? I wish Ramie could see this. I want to check on its connection with <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It's you, friend. I feel like m: SOLANUM: It's you, friend. I feel like my mind is clear now, but I can't explain this, even for myself.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I'm here, right? But how I am h: SOLANUM: I'm here, right? But how I am here? I thought about <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>]]> and now I am here.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: So, Nomai are dead? All of them: SOLANUM: So, Nomai are dead? All of them? It's really sad to know, but how much time has passed? Last thing I remember is that Bells guided me on the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>]]> pilgrimage like it was an hour ago. All these years I was trapped in quantum uncertainty.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I've never met one of your kind: SOLANUM: I've never met one of your kind before. It's an honor to speak with you! I particularly admire your four eyes. And I... I have to apologize on behalf of the clan. We tried to explode the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>sun</color>]]> once and that would've turned your race to ashes. This is unacceptable ethically, but I'm happy we failed. It is impossible for me not to say this, when I observe this young, curious race growing up.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I think it's time to find out w: SOLANUM: I think it's time to find out what is happening here and why we are here. You saw that <![CDATA[<color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>]]>? Is it.. broken? I need to check its <![CDATA[<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>]]> first.
DialogueDictionary.I went for ... for ... <![CDATA[<i>mushr: I went for ... for ... mushrooms]]>. Don't take my place! I'll be back soon. Get new launch codes]]> at the Observatory, Hornfels changed them at the last minute.
DialogueDictionary.Hey! What's going on? Where's the angler: Hey! What's going on? Where's the anglerfish?
DialogueDictionary.My tiny friend is gone! I called this an: My tiny friend is gone! I called this anglerfish <![CDATA[<color=orange>«Ernesto»</color>]]>. I can't believe he left me like that...
DialogueDictionary.Oh, why are you still here? Did you got: Oh, why are you still here? Did you got new <![CDATA[<color=orange>new launch codes</color>]]>?
DialogueDictionary.Is it that anglerfish from the museum?: Is it that anglerfish from the museum?
DialogueDictionary.Hornfels named angler from the exhibitio: Hornfels named angler from the exhibitionlike like that.
DialogueDictionary.Okay, you know what? Yes it's an anglerf: Okay, you know what? Yes it's an anglerfish from the museum. I'm fed up with marshmallow, can't take anymore.
DialogueDictionary.So you decided to eat <![CDATA[<color=or: So you decided to eat <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]>?! Hornfels said <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]> is a friend!
DialogueDictionary.Anglerfish is still a fish. Whatever he: Anglerfish is still a fish. Whatever he calls it, it's almost done... or not. I think it will be prepared in like 30 minutes]]>. Why don't you fly near the Dark Bramble]]> and just get the new one for Hornfels?
DialogueDictionary.You'll do that for me? Thanks! Just don': You'll do that for me? Thanks! Just don't tell anyone about <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]> alright?
There is no accounting for tastes.
DialogueDictionary.Thank you! Get back within <![CDATA[<i>3: Thank you! Get back within 30 minutes]]> and I'll give you a bite.

ShipLogDictionary.There's also Solanum signal coming from: There's also Solanum signal coming from Brittle Hollow.
I found Solanum in the School.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum saying that the black hole was s: Solanum saying that the black hole was smaller and that it was her school. She also don't want to fall down so she took a gravity crystall.
ShipLogDictionary.I can hear Solanum signal from Sunless C: I can hear Solanum signal from Sunless City.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Solanum in Sunless City. At the: I found Solanum in Sunless City. At the Eye Temple district, she is staying at her home.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum feels sad about the Nomai's blin: Solanum feels sad about the Nomai's blind faith in the Eye. She destroyed her old toys.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to try to get to the Vesse: Solanum wants to try to get to the Vessel. Is it possible for her to get inside Dark Bramble?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum did it! Whatever her power is, s: Solanum did it! Whatever her power is, she's here and waiting for me once again.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum has traced the coordinates of in: Solanum has traced the coordinates of incoming Nomai messages. Canna, the modern Nomai, declares that there's a safe place in the Gloaming Galaxy. The coordinates to Blackrock should be shown under the Vessel's bridge instead of the Eye signal hologram.
ShipLogDictionary.I found new coordinates to another Galax: I found new coordinates to another Galaxy. We can use the Warp Core from the Ash Twin Project to warp. There will be no turning back once I warp. Am I ready to do this?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to visit Giant's Deep, but: Solanum wants to visit Giant's Deep, but she will probably stay on Timber Hearth as well.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Solanum observing the probe logs: I found Solanum observing the probe logs. I've never seen nomai computers with such a green glow. She's accessing the Main Computer to know how much time has passed.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum feels sad about the Eye of the U: Solanum feels sad about the Eye of the Universe. Since childhood, she knew - the Eye has no wishes at all. It's not surprising that she don't want to know anything more about it. There was an active Memory Statue here that caught her eye.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if: Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if I show her all I know with vision torch from the Damaged Laboratory on The Stranger?
ShipLogDictionary.After the vision something strange happe: After the vision something strange happened. The clouds disappeared immediately and I can now hear strange frequency coming from Solanum. There are bizarre looking sparks on her mask.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum looks disoriented according to h: Solanum looks disoriented according to her reply.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum left some text near her body: Solanum left some text near her body
ShipLogDictionary.There are some new inscriptions left ver: There are some new inscriptions left very recently
ShipLogDictionary.It must be very strange to see your own: It must be very strange to see your own dead body. I'm not surprised Solanum that wants to leave this place as soon as possible. She took her recorder and vanished on mentioning Timber Hearth.
ShipLogDictionary.I believe there is a vision torch somewh: I believe there is a vision torch somewhere in the Damaged Laboratory. I wonder if it's still working.
ShipLogDictionary.I found that vision torch. Its flames st: I found that vision torch. Its flames still work even in space where there is no oxygen.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum's message was interrupted on men: Solanum's message was interrupted on mentioning Timber Hearth. Maybe she's there?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum somehow appeared on Timber Heart: Solanum somehow appeared on Timber Hearth near the Village. It seems like she's observing the Hearthians.
ShipLogDictionary.According to her recorder, she just thou: According to her recorder, she just thought of Timber Hearth and appeared there. That could be explainable with my new Quantum Rule. Solanum told me about the Sun Station, she apologized, but that's ok. Solanum also would like to know more about the Probe Tracking Module inside Giant's Deep.
ShipLogDictionary.I've discovered strange frequency called: I've discovered strange frequency called Quantum Consciousness.
ShipLogDictionary.This could be a new quantum rule or an q: This could be a new quantum rule or an quantum exception. My theory is that if an observer is aware of its quantum properties, it acquire Quantum Consciousness. Solanum probably got this knowledge from my vision.
ShipLogDictionary.Quantum Consciousness has a strong recog: Quantum Consciousness has a strong recognizable signal and it sounds similar to the Quantum Fluctuations. In fact, the signal is very strong. It can be heard even without signalscope.
ShipLogDictionary.Another noticable thing about Quantum Co: Another noticable thing about Quantum Consciousness - particles near the head. By the way, seems like other quantum rules are not working with Quantum Consciousness.
ShipLogDictionary.Quantum Consciousness somehow has the ab: Quantum Consciousness somehow has the ability to exist in a multiple places at the same time. Solanum declares that she can only think about a certain location and appear there. Hypothesis: she can appear only in known places.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to check the time loop con: Solanum wants to check the time loop control panel. I might find her inside the Ash Twin Project.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum is already here. She observing t: Solanum is already here. She observing the time loop ring's logs.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum just realized I'm in the time lo: Solanum just realized I'm in the time loop and that our Sun will supernova soon. Using the charged warp core, we might be able to escape. Seems like we will meet again inside he Vessel.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum just happened to pass right by t: Solanum just happened to pass right by the unpaired statue inside the Ash Twin Project. Now she's stuck in the time loop too.
ShipLogDictionary.Now Solanum knows how time loop reset is: Now Solanum knows how time loop reset is working. We will try reach the Vessel again.
ShipLogDictionary.Seriously, how anglerfish could just dis: Seriously, how anglerfish could just disappear?
ShipLogDictionary.Hornfels said that anglerfish «Ernesto»: Hornfels said that anglerfish «Ernesto» disappeared from exhibit.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Slate with Ernesto. He's cooking: I found Slate with Ernesto. He's cooking him on campfire.
ShipLogDictionary.Slate just fed up with marshmallow, that: Slate just fed up with marshmallow, that's why he decided to cook Ernesto. He saying it will be ready in 30 minutes so in case of time-loop reset it doesn't require intervention.
